description:
[h2]Logic Gate screens now render farther away![/h2]
Fixes that annoying problem where you can't see the face of the logic gate at farther (but still quite close) distances.

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Important![/h1]
[list]
[*]This is [b]NOT[/b] a file mod!
[*]This mod doesn't add any new parts, it only overrides the old Logic Gate with one that has a different Renderable.
[*]If you use this mod in your blueprint and publish it, people without this mod [b]WILL[/b] be able to spawn it in, [b]but will still have the LOD visibility problem[/b].
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Support:[/h2]
[*]Rate, Favorite, Share and Award!
[img]https://fagiano0.github.io/CrashlanderAPI/images/workshop/ratefavourite.gif[/img]
name: Logic Gate Visibility Fix
